    • safeBuild

      public AbstractRoom safeBuild(String schematicName, org.bukkit.Location start)
      Tries to build a room on a given location if:
      - The room wouldn't hit another room
      - The start location is on the grid
      Parameters:
      schematicName - The schematic to build at the start location
      start - The location to build it
      Returns:
      Null if the build wasn't concluded or the room which has been created
